title: Game-Based Language Learning Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience utilizing digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Game-based learning environments for language proficiency enhancement among working professionals.

learning_goals: Learners improve target language communication skills by 30% or more through game-based activities
Learners select game-based learning strategies aligned with their preferences among five game types (social achievers, explorers, socializers, competitors, trolls)
Learners successfully complete language projects incorporating game elements in PBL environments at least three times
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
